rows.label: qst201704_msg0001
rows.name:
Excuse me, Grand Marshal! I've come
to make a report about my repairs!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0002
rows.name:
My apologies, Newt, but the
report will have to wait.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0003
rows.name:
You look troubled, Grand
Marshal. Is there some problem?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes. It appears that a couple of
Ship-Eating Taos have taken up residence
on the Divine Beast Warship's wings.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0005
rows.name:
So at present I am pressed to find
a solution to this infestation.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0006
rows.name: Ship-Eating Taos?!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0007
rows.name:
What the hell?! We gotta
go drive them away!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0008
rows.name:
I know. We haven't just
been standing around
waiting for them to leave.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0009
rows.name:
But the monsters are proving stronger
than we anticipated and we're a little
stumped as to how to proceed.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0010
rows.name: Hmm.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0011
rows.name:
Grand Marshal! Permission
to make a suggestion?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0012
rows.name: Go on, Newt.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0013
rows.name:
Would you allow me to take
care of the Ship-Eating Taos?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0014
rows.name: You?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm doubtful that even one
such as you could take on a
brace of Ship-Eating Taos...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0016
rows.name:
But if we don't do something about
them, who knows what could happen.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0017
rows.name:
They could cause serious damage
to the ship if left unchecked!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0018
rows.name: So just let me at 'em!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0019
rows.name: Have you learned nothing, Newt?!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0020
rows.name:
Grand Marshal. Will you
entrust this task to us?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0021
rows.name: Meleph-dono... Perhaps. But...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0022
rows.name: It's all good, pal.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0023
rows.name: Newt's power is unparalleled.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0024
rows.name:
Besides, she's got Thunderbolt Zeke
and the Flamebringer at her side.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0025
rows.name:
This should be more than enough
to flush out a couple of vermin.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0026
rows.name: Very well. Good luck.
